abstract: Two major steel makers, United States Steel and AK Steel, issue gloomy forecasts for the rest of the year, citing weak economies in Europe and North America, depressed steel prices and higher raw materials.
snippet: Two major steel makers issued gloomy forecasts for the rest of the year, citing weak economies in Europe and North America, depressed steel prices and higher raw materials.
lead_paragraph: Two major steel makers issued gloomy forecasts for the rest of the year, citing weak economies in Europe and North America, depressed steel prices and higher raw materials.

headline.main: Steel Makers Expect Losses on Earnings
headline.print_headline: Steel Makers Expect Losses On Earnings
headline.seo: United States Steel and AK Steel Expect Lower Fourth-Quarter Earnings
